knowledgeDetails.datasetDescription: Hey, don't forget to adjust the chunk after adding the dataset! ðŸ˜‰
knowledgeDetails.testingDescription: Final step! After success, leave the rest to Infiniflow AI.
knowledgeDetails.topKTip: For the computaion cost, not all the retrieved chunk will be computed vector cosine similarity with query. The bigger the 'Top K' is, the higher the recall rate is, the slower the retrieval speed is.
knowledgeDetails.similarityThresholdTip: We use hybrid similarity score to evaluate distance between two lines of text. It's weighted keywords similarity and vector cosine similarity. If the similarity between query and chunk is less than this threshold, the chunk will be filtered out.
knowledgeDetails.vectorSimilarityWeightTip: We use hybrid similarity score to evaluate distance between two lines of text. It's weighted keywords similarity and vector cosine similarity. The sum of both weights is 1.0.
